title: 85/438/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 September 1985 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structure in the United Kingdom pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 September 1985
on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structure in the United Kingdom pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC)
(85/438/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Statutory Rules 1985 No 55: The grassland scheme (Northern Ireland) 1985 satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community for the implementation of the common measures within the meaning of Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC in the United Kingdom.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 September 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 96, 23. 4. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
